subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: With a goal from Andrés Iniesta in the 26th minute of extra time, Spain defeated the Netherlands and became the eighth country to win the World Cup.
snippet: With a goal from Andrés Iniesta in the 26th minute of extra time, Spain defeated the Netherlands and became the eighth country to win the World Cup.
